definition: Binjiang district of Hangzhou city 杭州市, Zhejiang

sentences.english: Lujiazui Area also has Ocean Aquarium and Riverside Promenade, etc.
sentences.chinese: 陸家嘴區域還包含海洋水族館，濱江大道等。

sentences.english: Software is the most developed areas in Riverside , you can find over there.
sentences.chinese: 軟件最發達的地方在濱江，你可以找下那邊的公司。

sentences.english: This is the place that deserves its fame as the center of Binjiang housing in Ningbo.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，無愧於寧波濱江居住的核心方向。

sentences.english: The Riverside rides on the coattails of that design and even cuts a few corners to get there.
sentences.chinese: 濱江騎上設計的燕尾服，甚至削減幾個小錢到那裏。

sentences.english: The residents of the Hankou Binjiang estate had been moved out weeks before.
sentences.chinese: 漢口濱江的居民數週前就已將財產轉移。

sentences.english: Here on this beautiful Riverside Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 那我就在美麗的濱江大道上。

sentences.english: The Leisure Thematic Exhibition Hall is located in the White Horse Lake Convention & Exhibition Center.
sentences.chinese: 主題館選址位於濱江區的白馬湖生態創意城會展中心。

sentences.english: The winding coastlines of the Yangtze and Jialing rivers enjoy great potential for riverside sight development.
sentences.chinese: 濱江岸線蜿蜒有致，兩江濱水景觀極具改造潛力。

sentences.english: The Coastal Park by the waters is an ideal place of a leisurely life.
sentences.chinese: 依水的濱江公園是一個理想的休閒場所。

sentences.english: We may take the Riverside Lot price is relatively high cost.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以採取濱江地段的價格是成本相對較高。

sentences.english: Riverside Group, a planning department who told reporter.
sentences.chinese: 濱江集團一位企劃部人士告訴記者。

sentences.english: The Expo Center is located in the riverside green space of Zone B, to the east of Lupu Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 世博中心位於盧浦大橋東側世博園區B區濱江綠地內。

sentences.english: Ambulance drivers parked 70 of their emergency vehicles along a riverside road in a pay protest.
sentences.chinese: 救護車司機停走在濱江路的薪酬抗議其緊急車輛70。

sentences.english: Xiaguan Riverfront will be a collection of new neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 南京下關濱江區將成爲一個新的社區聚集區。

sentences.english: The Binjiang Campus of the International College is located in Binjiang Higher Education Park, close to the banks of the Qiantangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 國際學院濱江學區座落在錢塘江畔的濱江高教園。

lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
